Record.ClassificationPath: Endocrine System Diseases/Adrenal Gland Diseases/Adrenocortical Hyperfunction
Record.Description: Excess production of ADRENAL CORTEX HORMONES such as ALDOSTERONE; HYDROCORTISONE; DEHYDROEPIANDROSTERONE; and/or ANDROSTENEDIONE. Hyperadrenal syndromes include CUSHING SYNDROME; HYPERALDOSTERONISM; and VIRILISM.
